content.description: A battery of <math alttext="e m f" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> <math alttext="open E" overflow="scroll"> <mi>Ɛ</mi> </math> is connected as shown to three resistors with resistances indicated in the diagram.
content.question: Which expression is equal to the power delivered by the battery?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 open E squared, and denominator 5 R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator open E squared, and denominator 4 R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 5 open E squared, and denominator 2 R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator open E squared, and denominator 3 R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 open E squared, and denominator 5 R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
